abstract: New York City Bar Association releases report calling for federal and state authorities to prioritize reduction of mass incarceration; offers several recommendations, including repealing or reducing mandatory minimum terms and reducing sentences for nonviolent offenders.
lead_paragraph: The report recommended changing sentencing laws, including repealing or reducing mandatory minimum terms, and cited racial disparities.

headline.main: New York City Bar Association Urges Reduction of Mass Incarceration in Report
headline.print_headline: Limit Mass Incarceration, City Bar Association Report Urges

snippet: The report recommended changing sentencing laws, including repealing or reducing mandatory minimum terms, and cited racial disparities.
